name: A Tame Tale Demo
description:
A Tame Tale Demo

Elise, a member of the Plain Shield Guild, is off to do her first mission, a simple task of finding a pet.

Explore the world, defeat enemies, and get better gear to help you in your adventure.

[Controls]

W, A, S, D -> Movement

Shift while Moving -> Run

E -> Interact

Left Mouse Button -> Attack

Right Mouse Button -> Defend

Right Mouse Button while Moving -> Dodge

[About the Developer]

I am working on this on my own and this is the first game that I have ever made. This game has already undergone a lot of changes and I have been working on it for at least a couple of years, but I'm proud of my progress. I'm using the Godot Engine to develop this. Any feedback or tips regarding the game or about game development in general would be helpful.
